com.gdxgame.core.utils

Enum SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SoundManager>
      • com.gdxgame.core.utils.SoundManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<SoundManager>

    public enum SoundManager
extends Enum<SoundManager>
    The SoundManager singleton is the core singleton to play and stop libgdx Sound and Music. It also supports functionality to adjust the volume of sounds and music.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      • values

        public static SoundManager[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (SoundManager c : SoundManager.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared

      • valueOf

        public static SoundManager valueOf(String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:

      • playSound

        public void playSound(SoundType sound)
        plays a specific sound with the current sound volume
        Parameters:
        sound - sound to be played

      • getSoundVolume

        public int getSoundVolume()
        returns current sound volume
        Returns:
        current sound volume (value between 0 and 100)

      • setSoundVolume

        public void setSoundVolume(int volume)
        sets current sound volume and stores the value in the game config file
        Parameters:
        volume - volume to be set (value between 0 and 100)

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(MusicType music,
                      boolean loop,
                      Music.OnCompletionListener onCompleteListener)
        plays a specific music with the current music volume. If an OnCompletionListener is passed then the listener will be notified once the music has finished playing.
        Parameters:
        music - type of music to be played
        loop - true to loop music playback. false to play music only once.
        onCompleteListener - listener to notify when music has finished playing

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(MusicType music,
                      boolean loop)
        Similar to playMusic(MusicType, boolean, com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music.OnCompletionListener) without specifying an OnCompletionListener
        Parameters:
        music - type of music to be played
        loop - true to loop music playback. false to play music only once.

      • stopCurrentMusic

        public float stopCurrentMusic()
        stops the current active music if there is any and returns the position of the current active music. This value can be used to resume a music to its last position.
        Returns:
        position of current active music or 0 if there is no active music yet

      • setMusicPosition

        public void setMusicPosition(float position)
        sets position of the current active music. See also stopCurrentMusic()
        Parameters:
        position - position of music to be set

      • getMusicVolume

        public int getMusicVolume()
        returns current music volume
        Returns:
        current music volume (value between 0 and 100)

      • setMusicVolume

        public void setMusicVolume(int volume)
        sets current music volume and stores value in the game config file
        Parameters:
        volume - new music volume (value between 0 and 100)
